ascend_skill.desc:
At the end of Ren's action, gain 1 Will of Rebellion stack for each foe with less than 60% HP (up to 5 stacks).
When Will of Rebellion reaches 3 stacks, gain an extra action.
An additional extra action cannot be gained during the extra action. (Extra actions do not affect the duration of effects with turn limits).
At the end of an extra action, spend 3 Will of Rebellion stacks.
*Can gain 1 Will of Rebellion stack per foe per battle.
ascend_skill.name: Rebellion Resurgence

ascend_skill.desc: Increase skill damage to the main target by 30%, and increase skill damage to other targets by 10%.
ascend_skill.name: Calling Card

ascend_skill.desc: On an extra action, decrease SP cost of skills by 80%. When Ren's SP is above 60%, increase Attack by 50%.
ascend_skill.name: Meditate

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Arsène's Chains and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Secret Maneuvers

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase number of Will of Rebellion stacks gained to 3.
ascend_skill.name: Highway Robbery

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Trickster's Plunder and Phantom Omen by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Moonlit Evening

ascend_skill.desc:
After taking an extra action, if there are foes with below 25% HP, deal damage to those foes equal to up to 250% of Ren's Attack (once per enemy per battle).
After using a skill on an extra action, deal Curse damage equal to 50% of Attack to all foes.
ascend_skill.name: Merciless Pursuit

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 205.0%/226.0%/217.6%/238.6% of Attack, and gain 1 Will of Rebellion stack.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 83.0%/91.5%/88.1%/96.6% of Attack. 20% chance to inflict Curse. Also gain 1 Will of Rebellion stack.
normal_skill.name: Trickster's Plunder

normal_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 97.6%/107.6%/103.6%/113.6% of Attack. When only 1 foe is present, gain 2 Will of Rebellion stacks.
normal_skill.name: Phantom Omen

normal_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 74.2%/81.8%/78.7%/86.3% of Attack. When used on an extra action, increase damage by 25%. When attacking foes with debuffs, increase damage by 25% more.
normal_skill.name: Arsène's Chains

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 18.0% for each Will of Rebellion stack.
passive_skill.name: Resistance

passive_skill.desc: Increase damage on extra actions by 72.0%.
passive_skill.name: Adverse Resolve
